channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Business At An Inflection Point: Will You Evolve Or Reinvent?

item.title: Hulu’s Best New Show Lands A 100% Rotten Tomatoes Critic Score
item.description: The best new show to hit Hulu in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: America’s Heartland Responds To AI
item.description: Studies are seeing a boom in AI in places like Ohio.
